title: Womens Dress Short Sleeve
title_original: LookbookStore Women's Short Sleeve Button Down Flowy Tiered Babydoll Denim Dress

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #46,904 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #444 in Women's Casual Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Casual

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the denim dress comfortable, well-made, and flattering, particularly noting it's great for summer wear. The material receives positive feedback for being sturdy and true to description, while the color options include bright pink and true poppy red. The fit and length receive mixed reviews - while some find it loose fitting, others say it runs big, and though many like the length above the knee, some find it too short. Select to learn more Look Quality Comfort Material quality Color Flattering Fit Length 438 customers mention "Look" 414 positive 24 negative Customers find the dress visually appealing, describing it as cute and wonderful for summer wear, with one customer noting its distressed look. "Everyone loves this dress! It is very flattering and is a cute , casual dress. I paired it with some western boots and got lots of compliments." Read more "Wore it with cowgirl boots and a cowgirl hat for a rodeo. SO CUTE . Love the length. Mid-thigh. Material isn’t heavy so it’s perfect for summer" Read more "This dress is super cute , and a perfect length.. it is a little snug in the shoulders and chest area, but I do have wide shoulders and I guess that..." Read more 216 customers mention "Quality" 198 positive 18 negative Customers find the dress to be well-made and high quality, particularly noting that it meets Amazon's standards. The buttons feel sturdy. Medium was pretty big so if you want a more fitted look the wear a smaller size...." Read more "...The dress is flattering and well made . I get lots of compliments and where I live and the darker red color I can wear it into early October...." Read more "...Wasnt as lightweight as I thought it would be. Other than that, good quality and I will wear, just not sure I will be able to wear on vacation." A tad short, I am 5’3, if I lifted up my arms the dress came up very high so I made sure to wear shorts underneath" Read more "...Bought in the light denim. So comfortable . Launders well. Great buy, except for one thing. IT NEEDS POCKETS!..." Just doesn't have enough material in the top for bustier women." items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!!
items.body: Love!! Got this for an FSU football game and the color and material was perfect! Didn’t show sweat and the fit and length was perfect! Will be buying it in other colors! Read more
items.author: Tiffany Reed

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product! Very cute!
items.body: from reading the reviews of this dress i was iffy, i read that it was stiff thick material, and to small in the bust area. i was obsessed with this dress though so ordered it anyway and i am not disappointed!!! its a very manageable material, not stiff at all but not cotton like either. thin & not hott. now it is small in the bust line, i am a DD and theres a gap in one of the buttons but nothing a little pin wont fix, i love this dress. great length. could be summer or fall. can't wait to pair it with some fall boots! small bust area is the only reason i didn't give it a 5. 5'4 200lbs and it hides everything you would want it too, can't even see your belly. Read more
items.author: jamie d

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute style, fits TTS
items.body: Cute dress and I like the softness of the material. I wore it for my daughter’s birthday. Unfortunately I hadn’t noticed it had a large brown stain on the front so had to pretend I spilled coffee on myself. I wont be able to wear it again. Must have been returned by someone before me and wasn’t noticed. Read more
items.author: Julia McShane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: Love my dress I have worn it a couple times now. I get a lot of compliments. I wish the denim was a little thinner, but it is fine. It is a traditional denim thickness. It is not fabric that looks denim it is actual jean material. It is a little tight in the breast area, I am usually a XL/14, 40C. Read more
items.author: ALPB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Comfortable Dress
items.body: Very cute dress! I did need to iron it just a bit when it came out of the dryer. I also sewed the rolled sleeves just a little so they wouldn’t unroll while I was wearing the dress. It’s very comfortable and the fabric is a nice medium weight. Read more
items.author: TEC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great transition to fall dress
items.body: Such a cute dress I might grab it in the darker wash too. It fits great, washes and dries well. You can dress it up or down. I feel like this is a spring, summer, and fall staple. Read more
items.author: Shae Sherlinski

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adorable! Tight in the chest
items.body: This dress is seriously adorable. I had to return though because it was slightly too tight in the chest. It felt like good quality and wasn’t too heavy. I ordered the brown color and loved the quality of it. Very flattering for a boy so flat tummy. It was true to size outside of the chest. You could try to size up for those purposes. Read more
items.author: Morgan

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A1 Reef Blue, Aurora Pink, Russet Orange, Army Green, Pecan Brown, Simply Green, Love Printing - Aurora Powder, Parfait Pink, A2 Bay Blue, Light Taupe, Wishful Blue, Lavender, Medium Blue, Verdant Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
